item.title: Help with coding Mage shortbow spec
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

add in special.java
under switch(item) {
Add:

case 861:

and under public void loginSpec(client c, int item) {
Add:

case 861:

And add in client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 256, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 249); rangeGFX(95, 249); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }

If you donâ€™t know where in client java search :

specialAmount

You will see items whit spec then just add the

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 256, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 249); rangeGFX(95, 249); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }
Under one.

Yw

Goodluck

Read full topic

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 256, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 249); rangeGFX(95, 249); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }
